scripts.tags: npx cypress-tags run -e TAGS='@mutilSelect' --browser chrome --headed && npm run headedLess -- --browser electron --headed
scripts.dashBoredMultiBrower: npm run dashBoardHeadeless -- --browser chrome --headed &&  npm run dashBoardHeadeless -- --browser edge --headed
scripts.multiBrowser: npm run headedLess -- --browser electron --headed  &&  npm run headedLess -- --browser edge --headed  &&  npm run headedLess -- --browser chrome --headed
